title: How do I get people to stop asking me out without sacrificing my dignity?
body:
I have to put up with it every time I drive out into the city, and it can get really annoying. The only place where I really don't mind it is at the gym, since most of the time people will give up their machines for me and even fetch weights, but everywhere else it's just a nuisance. When I first moved here it was kind of funny for the first week, but that was like a year ago. 

I don't want to have to start shaving my head or dressing badly just to get rid of them. I suppose I could start frowning more, but I really don't want to be that kind of person. It's just such a pain being wanted everywhere I go.
